text: "Do you believe in the human heart? I don’t mean simply the organ, obviously. I’m speaking in the poetic sense. The human heart. Do you think there is such a thing? Something that makes each of us special and individual?"
"You become responsible, forever, for what you have tamed."
"You don’t have to understand life. You just have to live it."
"The universe doesn’t care about your plans, but it responds to your actions."
"It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye."
"We choose to go to the Moon not because it is easy, but because it is hard. And because that goal will serve to organize and measure the best of our energies and skills."
